sendHint: Send your chosen Ethereum amount to the address to receive equivalent tokens.
hintText1: Ethereum network deposits Only. Avoid BNB, BSC networks, and third-party smart contracts.
hintText2: Do NOT send NFTs to this ETH deposit address. A recovery administrative fee may apply for NFT deposits.
hintText3: The value of ETH may change between now and the time we receive your payment
hintText4: Enter your Ethereum wallet Address to receive funds. Once confirmed, withdrawals are typically processed within minutes..
